subject: Marathon Running
Olympic Games (2008)
Deaths (Obituaries)
London Marathon
lead_paragraph: Wanjiru shattered the 24-year-old Olympic record in the marathon in 2008, becoming the youngest winner of the event, and also won marathons in London and Chicago.
snippet: Wanjiru shattered the 24-year-old Olympic record in the marathon in 2008, becoming the youngest winner of the event, and also won marathons in London and Chicago.
